Oh, absolutely.
Both the United States and quite a number of other countries are pushing nuclear hard as one of the clean energy options that are available.

In France, CO2 emissions per capita are significantly lower than ours - or Canada's, for that matter - and yet the French are trying to turn away a bit from nuclear power.
